resources.string: Donate Via \n You Call We Collect

If you will Register as a DONOR you can:


•	 Post Items for donation

 •	 Donate Money

 •	 View/Update the Posted Items

 •	 View donated item status

 •	 View the previous donations reports

 •	 View Notifications


If you will Register as a REQUESTOR you can:


•	 Search Items according to your specific need

 •	 Send request for the items

 •	 Send Request for the money

 •	 Complete Profile to get the requested item

 •	 View Request Status

 •	 View Notifications

Give2Share " You Call We Collect " service makes it easy for you to donate your unwanted goods. Give those old books, clothes, household items etc. that is getting dusted at some corner of your house a new life. Schedule a donation pickup today and we will collect your donations from your location and help us spread happiness :) 

 Call us at:

 +92-21-111-11-1111

 +92-21-222-222-222
Send your donations to Give2Share through easypaisa donation portal, your easypaisa mobile account or from any of the 70,000+ easypaisa shops nationwide.
The email address and password combination you entered cannot be recognized or does not exist. Please try again.
